text: Li could mean: *The Chinese word for plum, a very popular surname in China *An alternate romanisation of the Japanese word for plum, ri, which originates from the above word in Chinese. It can also be pronounced as sumomo. *An ethnic group of China, Hlai, which is known as Li among Han Chinese. *The chemical symbol for lithium. *Li (unit) (é‡Œ), a Chinese unit of length, often used when talking about distance.
title: Li
